# Preface {-}

This document outlines some of the utilities of _mixOmics_ package. If you run into any issues reproducing these results, please let us know by creating an issue [here](https://github.com/mixOmicsTeam/Bookdown/issues). Also, feel free to share your experience/suggestions in [mixOmics Discourse forum](https://mixomics-users.discourse.group/).
